projects.title: GPT-3 Landing Page
projects.description: React-powered landing page. Seamlessly navigate with React Router DOM, experiencing interactive sections on GPT-3, OpenAI, and captivating case studies. Stay informed through regular blog updates, delving into the future of AI. Crafted with React, CSS, and JavaScript, this project blends aesthetics.This Project with reference figma design

projects.title: Restaurant Landing Page
projects.description: Incorporating React, React Router DOM, CSS, and React Bootstrap, our restaurant landing page seamlessly guides users through Home, About, Our Menu, Shop, Blog, and Contact sections. With stylish CSS design and responsive React Bootstrap components, the page promises an engaging and visually pleasing experience for visitors exploring our culinary offerings.

projects.title: Movie Application
projects.description: Embark on a comprehensive journey building a movie detail application from scratch. Leverage Axios for dynamic API calls, React Router DOM for seamless routing, and SASS for styling. This project delves into React with Redux Toolkit, showcasing the transition from synchronous to asynchronous action creators using Thunk Middleware. Explore advanced features including a Redux Thunk-powered search filter and elevate the UI with a responsive Movie Card Slider using the react-slick library.

projects.title: Crypto Lens
projects.description: Developed an innovative Crypto Lense application using Chakra UI, Framer Motion, React Responsive Carousel, React ChartJS, React Router DOM, and Axios. This dynamic web app provides comprehensive details on cryptocurrencies and exchanges, offering a user-friendly experience for exploring real-time data. Leveraging the CoinGecko API, users can effortlessly navigate through coin information, view exchange data, and gain insights through interactive charts. The combination of responsive design, smooth animations, and seamless navigation enhances user engagement. This project showcases my proficiency in React-based technologies, API integration, providing a practical solution for cryptocurrency enthusiasts.
